segments.text: I see the woman absorbed in her task, seemingly oblivious to the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how she can focus so intensely on drying that plate while the sink overflows right next to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water cascades down the cabinet doors like an uninvited guest, completely disregarding the neatness of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of concern for the children; they are playing a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that rickety stool, reaching for cookies like he's about to touch the stars.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but the thought of him tumbling backward makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, eagerly reaching with her hand out, trusting her brother to deliver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost sweet, the way they are working together, but it just feels so wrong in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nobody seems to notice the little crisis brewing in the kitchen; it's as if time has stopped for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen next; will someone slip, or will they get away with their little heist?
segments.speaker: PAR
